text: Huntington Park is a city in the Gateway Cities district of southeastern Los Angeles County, California. As of the 2020 census, the city had a population of 54,883. Huntington Park was made in 1906 as a streetcar suburb for workers in the rapidly expanding industries to the southeast of downtown Los Angeles. To this day, about 30% of its residents work at factories in nearby Vernon and Commerce.http://factfinder.census.gov/ Factfinder.census.gov ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Cities in California Category:Settlements in Los Angeles County, California Category:1906 establishments in California
title: Huntington Park, California
